simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function provides direct access to the very powerful Perl function split. It splits STRING to a list of fields. PATTERN is a regular expression specifying strings delimiting individual fields of STRING. If PATTERN is empty, STRING is split to individual characters. If the regular expression in PATTERN is enclosed in brackets, then strings matching PATTERN are also included in the resulting list.
The function returns a node-set consisting of newly created <xsh:string> elements containing individual strings of the resulting list as their only text child nodes.
